tool.name: sbb2nwi

param.name: in_Tab
param.dialogReference: Input table to be processed. (This table will be modified by the addition of SBB rule fields.)

tool.summary:
Assigns Site Building Blocks (SBB) rules 5, 6, 7, and 9 to National Wetland Inventory (NWI) codes, where applicable.

Note that this tool creates a binary column for each rule. If the rule applies to a record, the value in the corresponding column is set to 1, otherwise the value is 0. Each record can have one or more rules assigned, or no rules at all.

IMPORTANT: For this function to work correctly, the input table must have specific fields. To ensure that this is true, the table should be generated by the preceding "Parse NWI codes" tool.

dataIdInfo.idAbs:

Note that this tool creates a binary column for each rule. If the rule applies to a record, the value in the corresponding column is set to 1, otherwise the value is 0. Each record can have one or more rules assigned, or no rules at all.

IMPORTANT: For this function to work correctly, the input table must have specific fields. To ensure that this is true, the table should be generated by the preceding "Parse NWI codes" tool.
dataIdInfo.idCredit: Kirsten R. Hazler (Virginia Natural Heritage Program)
